game.title: The Last Hope
game.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, humanity's last city is under attack by a powerful alien force. Players take on the role of a skilled fighter who must navigate the ruins of the old world to find a way to defeat the aliens and save what's left of humanity.
game.beginning: The game begins with the player character emerging from a hidden underground bunker, where they've been living for years. The player soon discovers that the city is in shambles and that the alien invasion has destroyed most of the population.
game.ending: After fighting through hordes of aliens and rival human factions, the player finally reaches the heart of the alien base and confronts the leader of the invasion force. In a final showdown, the player must use all their skills and abilities to defeat the alien leader and destroy the invasion fleet, saving humanity from extinction.
